<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fids","in":"query","required":true,"description":"Comma separated list of farcaster ids. Only positive integers are accepted. Max 100 fids are accepted.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"scorer_slug","in":"query","description":"The slug of the scorer to filter the score","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-API-KEY","in":"header","description":"Your Talent Protocol API key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>

  id={undefined}

>
